ru.cfif11.cosmo.physobject

Interface HasMassInterface

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CanAttractInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MassAttractObject3D, MassObject3D

    public interface HasMassInterface
    Interface for any PhysObject3D having mass

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMass(double mass)
      Adds weight to the PhysObject3D
      void giveMass(double mass)
      Takes away part of mass of the object PhysObject3D
      boolean isGravity(com.threed.jpct.SimpleVector GravityField)
      Attracted whether the object in this gravitational field?

    • Method Detail

      • addMass

        Adds weight to the PhysObject3D
        Parameters:

      • giveMass

        void giveMass(double mass)
        Takes away part of mass of the object PhysObject3D
        Parameters:

      • isGravity

        boolean isGravity(com.threed.jpct.SimpleVector GravityField)
        Attracted whether the object in this gravitational field?
        Parameters:
        GravityField - the gravitational field
        Returns:
        yes, if the field is strong or not
